name: dsifford/wordpress
description: > A disposable Docker WordPress environment that just works, inspired by [visiblevc/wordpress-starter](https://github.com/visiblevc/wordpress-starter).

scripts.wp: wpcmd() { docker exec $(docker ps -lq) /bin/bash -c "sudo -u www-data wp $(echo $@)"; };wpcmd

author: Derek P Sifford
